actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-545, by Mr. Frost.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 5006 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. All points of order against consideration of the bill for failure to comply with sec. 302 (f) of the Budget Act shall be waived. It shall be in order to consider the committee amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Armed Services now printed in the bill. Pro forma amendments for the purpose of debate shall be offered only by the chairman or ranking minority member of the Committee on Armed Services. Measure will be read by section. Specified amendments are in order. No amendment to the Committee substitute shall be in order except amendments specified in the report to accompany this resolution, H.Rpt. 102-545, considered in the order and manner specified in the report, not subject to amendm...
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 138.
Supplemental report filed by the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 102-545, Part II.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 257 - 136 (Roll no. 152).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5006) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1993 for military functions of the Department of Defense, to prescribe military personnel levels for fiscal year 1993, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5006 (armed forces funding).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5006) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1993 for military functions of the Department of Defense, to prescribe military personnel levels for fiscal year 1993, and for other purposes.
